result.html: Cuir chugam an bosca adhmaidPass me that wooden box.
result.ponchtml: Cuir ċugam an bosca aḋmaidPass me that wooden box.

result.eng: Here's a box of chocolates as a sign of thanks.
result.ga: Seo chugat bosca seacláide mar chomhartha buíochais
result.orig: Seo chugat bosca seacláide mar chomhartha buíochais
result.html: Seo chugat bosca seacláide mar chomhartha buíochaisHere's a box of chocolates as a sign of thanks.
result.ponchtml: Seo ċugat bosca seacláide mar ċoṁarṫa buíoċaisHere's a box of chocolates as a sign of thanks.

result.eng: Open the box, Mommy. I am not able to open it.
result.ga: Oscail an bosca a Mhama Níl mé in ann é a oscailt
result.orig: Oscail an bosca a Mhama Níl mé in ann é a oscailt
result.html: Oscail an bosca a Mhama Níl mé in ann é a oscailtOpen the box, Mommy. I am not able to open it.
result.ponchtml: Oscail an bosca a Ṁama Níl mé in ann é a oscailtOpen the box, Mommy. I am not able to open it.
